      • startRegistration

        protected abstract UncontrolledRegistration startRegistration()
        This method is called when it is connected to the controller and the registration object should be sent.
        Returns:
        The UncontrolledRegistration that will be sent to the controller.

      • receivedAllocation

        protected abstract void receivedAllocation(ResourceMessage message)
        This method is called when a message has been received from the controller. This will generally be an Allocation object, but could also be of another type, depending on the used message type.
        Parameters:
        message - The received message

        protected final boolean isConnectedWithResourceController()
        Indicate if this driver is currently connected to a ControllerManager.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if this driver is currently connected to a ControllerManager

      • sendMessage

        protected void sendMessage(ResourceMessage message)
        Sends a message to the attached controller. The call is ignored when it is not connected.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is to be sent to the controller.
